mapper.select: select inquiry_no, member_id, product_no, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_reg_date, inquiry_status, inquiry_type from inquiries order by inquiry_no desc limit #{startRowIndex}, #{viewDataCntPerPage}

select i.inquiry_no, i.member_id, i.product_no, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_reg_date, i.inquiry_status, i.inquiry_type, p.product_name from inquiries i left join products p on i.product_no = p.product_no where i.inquiry_no = #{inquiry_no}
select inquiry_no, inquiry_image_no, inquiry_image_uri, inquiry_image_name, inquiry_image_original_name from inquiry_images where inquiry_no = #{inquiry_no}
select inquiry_reply_no, inquiry_no, reply_content, reply_reg_date, admin_id from inquiry_replies where inquiry_no = #{inquiry_no}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry_replies (inquiry_no, reply_content, admin_id) values (#{inquiry_no}, #{reply_content}, #{admin_id})
mapper.update: update inquiries set inquiry_status = 'C' where inquiry_no = #{inquiryNo}
